original: Nooghaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… noyogaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Oghagocchakayogagocchakesu āmasanaṁ āsavagocchake āmasanasadisaṁ.)
analyzed: noogham dhammam paṭicca pe noyogam dhammam paṭicca pe ogha gocchaka yoga gocchakesu āmasanam āsava gocchake āmasana sadisa

original: Nonīvaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Nīvaraṇagocchake āmasanaṁ saññojanagocchake āmasanasadisaṁ.)
analyzed: no nīvaraṇam dhammam paṭicca pe nīvaraṇa gocchake āmasanam saññojana gocchake āmasana sadisa
